message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Let's try a bit more in my favor, considering the inflation!
The inflation hurts you more than me, Bob. I'm being generous here.
I'll take a bit more, since I'm losing value faster. Come on, Alice, let's close this!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's split it evenly and call it a day. It's the last offer I make before walking away.
